name: Cult of The Cheesecake: The Unholy Feast
summary: "In this spine-chilling adventure, you will delve into the eerie world of a cult that worships a sinister deity through the creation and consumption of blasphemous cheesecakes. As the protagonist, you must navigate through a nightmarish maze of secrets, rituals, and unspeakable horrors to unravel the truth and escape with your sanity intact. Did I mention you are being followed by the cult leader?"
